text: Rhode Island veterans honored in Washington D.C. WARWICK, R.I. (WLNE) — World War II and the Korean and Vietnam Wars veterans were honored in a free flight to Washington D.C. this weekend.The Rhode … More stories from [Washington (D.C.)](/topic/washingtondc) More stories from [Washington Metro Area](/topic/washingtonmetropolitanarea) [Driver dies after crashing into White House gate](/topic/washingtonmetropolitanarea/driver-dies-after-crashing-into-white-house-gate/a-HWK5KfwqRoWXXy5nb2sf3Q%3Aa%3A419161690-0706550226%2Fwashingtonpost.com) A motorist died after crashing a speeding car into an outer gate at the White House complex late Saturday, the Secret Service said. “There was no threat to the White House,” Secret Service spokesman Anthony Guglielmi said in a post on X, and “no threat or public safety implications.” [Italian engineers propose new design for collapsed Baltimore bridge - WTOP News](/topic/washingtonmetropolitanarea/italian-engineers-propose-new-design-for-collapsed-baltimore-bridge---wtop-news/f-6c855d4b24%2Fwtop.com) An Italian company that helped rebuild a bridge that collapsed in Genoa, Italy, in 2018 said it is ready to do the same in Baltimore.
